jishoData.meaning: annexed, accompany, marry, suit, meet, satisfy, attach, append, garnish, imitate

onyomiExamples.meaning: accompanying (on a trip), escorting (a tour group)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to garnish, to accompany (as a card does a gift), to add to as support, to prop up, to accompany (as an aid, guide, translator, etc.), to mimic, to imitate, to draw something near to oneself, to approach nearby

to meet (wishes, expectations, etc.), to satisfy, to comply with, to live up to, to accompany, to go with, to stay by one's side, to associate with (someone), to mix with, to marry, to wed, to be added
water-filled bamboo tube in Japanese garden which clacks against a stone when emptied
